triggers.description: Releases a searing cone of optical energy
triggers.name: Radiant Flare

triggers.description: Retreats to a safe range, recharging shields and repairing hull damage
triggers.name: Blink

triggers.description: Charges and fires an incinerating beam of laser light
triggers.name: Transfixing Gaze

triggers.description: Greatly increases rate of fire by enhancing targeting and fire control systems
triggers.name: All-Seeing Eye

triggers.description: Creates a burst of high-energy neutrons
triggers.name: Neutron Blast

triggers.description: Deploys an all-around pattern of bombs
triggers.name: Omnifire Explosives

triggers.description: Activates the auxiliary shield
triggers.name: Auxiliary Shield

triggers.description: Massively boosts main gun performance
triggers.name: Weapon Overcharge

triggers.description: Damages nearby enemies using spacetime cracking
triggers.name: Shockwave

triggers.description: Propels a spray of superheated neutrons
triggers.name: Neutron Haymaker

triggers.description: Launches a barrage of plasma rockets
triggers.name: Javelin Rockets

triggers.description: Generates a large emergency shield, producing a massive quantum shellburst as the shield expires
triggers.name: Battle Aegis

triggers.description: Fires a forward-mounted laser array
triggers.name: Laser Beams

triggers.description: Lunges forward to attack with plasma jaws, restoring hull and cooldown on a hit
triggers.name: Jaws

triggers.description: Releases a salvo of homing missiles
triggers.name: Sharklets

triggers.description: Boosts fire rate while damaging nearby enemies, doubling their susceptibility to further damage
triggers.name: Blood Frenzy

triggers.description: Deploys a spread of multi-phase positron torpedoes
triggers.name: Positronic Torpedoes

triggers.description: Creates a charm-strange quarkfield anomaly, expelling radiation in all directions
triggers.name: Quark Blast

triggers.description: Negates the dimensional phase matrix, repairing hull damage and temporarily dematerializing the Wasp
triggers.name: Phase Negation

triggers.description: Uses advanced repressurization techniques to greatly boost main gun performance
triggers.name: Coupling Overload

triggers.description: Launches a plasma-based grenade
triggers.name: Plasma Fragmentation Burst

triggers.description: Activates repairbots and dispenses nanorepair packs
triggers.name: Nanorepair

triggers.description: Ignites quantum fires on nearby enemies
triggers.name: Quantum Fireburst

triggers.description: Channels a cone of superheated ions
triggers.name: Directed Ion Burst

triggers.description: Damages nearby enemies with a burst of self-repairing virtuon particles
triggers.name: Virtuon Blast

triggers.description: Fires a trio of grenades while performing a self-repair protocol
triggers.name: Justice Barrage

triggers.description: Zaps a nearby target with a searing ray of atomic energy, recharging shields with overflow power
triggers.name: Atomic Ray

triggers.description: Blasts away nearby enemy projectiles, temporarily boosting gun fire rate
triggers.name: Supercharge

triggers.description: Fires three explosive canister charges.
triggers.name: Bomblet Dispenser

triggers.description: Fires six blasts in quick succession.
triggers.name: Cylinder Dump

triggers.description: Repairs hull and recharges shields.
triggers.name: Reload

triggers.description: Fires a devastating blast and enhances firing speed.
triggers.name: Hand Cannon

triggers.description: Damages nearby enemies with an intense polaric reaction
triggers.name: Goretusk Detonation

triggers.description: Teleports forward, temporarily disabling nearby enemies
triggers.name: Hog Charge

triggers.description: Instantly reforms the shield by shunting power from the reserve teracapacitor
triggers.name: Bristlehide Recharge

triggers.description: Initiaties emergency self-repair while greatly boosting damage output
triggers.name: War Boar

triggers.description: Deploys a spread of multi-phase positron torpedoes
triggers.name: Stinger Torpedoes

triggers.description: Expels radiation in all directions by creating a charm-strange quarkfield anomaly
triggers.name: Quark Blast

triggers.description: Dematerializes the Wasp and repairs hull damage by negating the dimensional phase matrix
triggers.name: Phase Negation

triggers.description: Boosts main gun range and damage using advanced repressurization techniques
triggers.name: Venom Overload

triggers.description: Activates dual endothermic detonators, chilling enemies in the blast zones and recharging shields
triggers.name: Cryo Bomb

triggers.description: Fires five freeze rockets
triggers.name: Frigid Claws

triggers.description: Launches forward, freezing any enemy hit and activating an auxiliary shield
triggers.name: Frosty Ambush

triggers.description: Creates a large zone of negative temperature anomalies
triggers.name: Ice Storm
